segments.text: Yes , it is . Hi , Tom ! It's a real surprise to see you here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's been a long time ! What's new ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing much . What about you ? Is everything going well ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not bad I guess . I just got back from Hawaii .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had a good time . You seem to be in a hurry . Don't let me hold you up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I've got a meeting in half an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I won't keep you then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! It's good to see you . Goodbye !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Give me your email , would you ?
segments.speaker: S2
